original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the seven hundred million perfect buddhas!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba /
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, the one with great compassion,

original: gnod pa thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: gnod pa thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa /
translated: the one who liberates from all harms,

original: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa /
translated: the one who pacifies all illnesses,

original: 'byung po thams cad nges par zlog pa /
analyzed: 'byung po thams cad nges par zlog pa /
translated: the one who definitely averts all spirits,

original: sems can mi khom pa brgyad du ltung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sems can mi khom pa brgyad du ltung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: the one who perfectly liberates beings who have fallen into the eight unfavorable states.🔽Having paid homage to him, I will now recite this dhāraṇī

original: de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad pa'i gzungs /
analyzed: de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad pa'i gzungs /

analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol /

analyzed: tri ne tre ya sv'ah'a /

original: tri na tre ya pra ham ru p'a ya sv'ah'a /🔽a'a k'a sh'a ya sv'ah'a /🔽shi ni shi ni sv'ah'a /🔽pra tsa pa ta ye sv'ah'a /🔽ya ma ye sv'ah'a /🔽ya ma bhungya sv'ah'a /🔽aanda dze bhyo bhya te bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽dza ra yu dze bhyo bhyu te bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽sam sve da @48b tshe bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽aom pa pa tu ke bhyo bhyu te bhya: sv'a h'a /🔽bi ti ka bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽bee dha ti ki bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽shpha shna ke bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽sa na ni pa hi ki bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'a h'a; sarba buddho sv'ah'a /🔽sarba bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a /
analyzed: tri na tre ya pra ham ru p'a ya sv'ah'a / a'a k'a sh'a ya sv'ah'a / shi ni shi ni sv'ah'a / pra tsa pa ta ye sv'ah'a / ya ma ye sv'ah'a / ya ma bhungya sv'ah'a / aanda dze bhyo bhya te bhya: sv'ah'a / dza ra yu dze bhyo bhyu te bhya: sv'ah'a / sam sve da @48b tshe bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a / aom pa pa tu ke bhyo bhyu te bhya: sv'a h'a / bi ti ka bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a / bee dha ti ki bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a / shpha shna ke bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a / sa na ni pa hi ki bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'a h'a; sarba buddho sv'ah'a / sarba bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a /
translated: Triṇatraya praharūpāya svāhā.🔽Ākāśāya svāhā.🔽Śini śini svāhā.🔽Pracapataye svāhā.🔽Yamaye svāhā.🔽Yamabhuṃjye svāhā.🔽Andha jhe bhyo bhyate bhyasvāhā.🔽Jarayu jhe bhyūte bhyasvāhā.🔽Saṃsve tshe bhyote bhyasvāhā.🔽Oṃ papatuke bhyote bhyasvāhā.🔽Vitīka bhyote bhyasvāhā.🔽Vaidhatikibhyote bhyasvāhā.🔽Śapha śaṃke bhyādhyi bhyasvāhā.🔽Sanani pahi kibhyādhyi bhyasvāhā.🔽Sarvabuddhāṃ svāhā.🔽Sarvabhyādhyi bhyasvāhā.🔽

original: bhu me aanta ri shi ts'a rye bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽'di lta ste /🔽aom tra ta tra ta /🔽tri ti tri ti /🔽tru tu tru tu /
analyzed: bhu me aanta ri shi ts'a rye bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a /🔽'di lta ste /🔽aom tra ta tra ta /🔽tri ti tri ti /🔽tru tu tru tu /
translated: Bhumantarishicharyebhyo bhyadhibhyasvaha.🔽Thus it is.🔽Om tratal tratal🔽tritati tritati🔽trututi trututi🔽

original: bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las srungs shig sv'ah'a /
analyzed: bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / nad thams cad las srungs shig sv'ah'a /
translated: Protect me from all fears, all harms, and all illnesses, svāhā.
